name: Steel Bond (jendiroba)
description:
THEME: Try it together!

Steel Bond is a cooperative game, where you join forces with a fellow adventurer to  solve together puzzles that build the defenses against waves of corrupted steampunk robots.

You need to the defend the core from enemies by forming little square formations  the grid with the blocks you grab on the ground - Those will be replaced with a turret that will shoot at enemies. HERE IS THE TWIST: You can't carry blocks along the bridge, so you will have to toss them to your friend to get them to the other side.

CONTROLS FOR PLAYER 1:
WASD - Move
E -Grab
SPACE - Attack or toss

CONTROLS FOR PLAYER 2:
ARROW KEYS - Move
RIGHT SHIFT - Grab
RIGHT CTRL - Attack or toss

Team: Thiago Nogueira
Gustavo Jendiroba
Cássio Eduardo
